title: Suggestion for Ekko E balance
body: For the most part I think he is really well balanced but I just think his e is a little too powerful. Not the range, just the fact it can pop on-hit effects like lich bane make it so it is an upgraded fizz q. Soooo much damage as well as an instant teleport. I think if you remove his ability to proc on hit effects like the lich bane on the e, it would make him balanced.

replies.body:
A) it's an auto.
B) the E is fine, taking off on hit effects is a stupid and extremely unnecessary nerf, and honestly, would probably just change the build instead of the champion.
lol, reminds me of a couple of days ago, this ekko just escaped my irelia combo with his flash, he proceeds to ult back to his previous place so I can combo him, how convenient!!
He is high risk high reward.

> "High Risk, High Reward"

AoE Slow on Q for insane kiting/chase
AoE Slow/Stun on W for insane kiting/chase WITH a 0.8AP scaling shield
A dash AND blink on his E for insane kiting/chase
Instant blink and self-heal ultimate so if he happens to get caught out he can just press R and walk away.

Where is the risk???
